page.title: 12THE GRAHAMS of BUCHANAN
page.content: In 1682 James,the 3rd marquis purchased this estate from the Buchanans. In the 1850's Buchanan castle now a ruin,was built. It was designed by William Adam. In 1935 this house proved to be too large and the Grahams moved to Auchmar just past Milton of Buchanan on the way to Balmaha. The emblem of the Grahams is the laurel and their motto 'Ne oublie'. The present Marquis of Graham has 2 farms now in the estate. He is a very keen farmer. His estate has about 1 or 2 thousand acres. He has a flock of about 1000 sheep and about 350 cows. He has 3 of a family,2boys and 1 girl. Their ages are 13,11,and 9.
